publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1307 Mr Andrew Welsh: Replacement of Montrose Bridge-That the Parliament recognises the vital lifeline provided by the A95 bridge over the South Esk at Montrose and its importance for the whole north-east economy; notes the recent comments by the First Minister pertaining to the Scottish Executive's commitment to areas outwith Scotland's central belt, and urges it to show that commitment by taking urgent action to provide funding for the essential replacement of Montrose Bridge. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*, Brian Adam*, Irene McGugan*, Bruce Crawford*, Shona Robison*
S1M-1307 Replacement of Montrose Bridge (lodged on 1 November 2000) Alex Johnstone*

S1M-1307 Mr Andrew Welsh: Replacement of Montrose Bridge—That the Parliament recognises the vital lifeline provided by the A95 bridge over the South Esk at Montrose and its importance for the whole north-east economy; notes the recent comments by the First Minister pertaining to the Scottish Executive’s commitment to areas outwith Scotland’s central belt, and urges it to show that commitment by taking urgent action to provide funding for the essential replacement of Montrose Bridge. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Brian Adam, Irene McGugan, Bruce Crawford, Shona Robison, Alex Johnstone, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1307 Replacement of Montrose Bridge (lodged on 1 November 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr David Davidson*
S1M-1307 Replacement of Montrose Bridge (lodged on 1 November 2000) Ms Sandra White*

S1M-1307 Mr Andrew Welsh: Replacement of Montrose Bridge-That the Parliament recognises the vital lifeline provided by the A95 bridge over the South Esk at Montrose and its importance for the whole north-east economy; notes the recent comments by the First Minister pertaining to the Scottish Executive's commitment to areas outwith Scotland's central belt, and urges it to show that commitment by taking urgent action to provide funding for the essential replacement of Montrose Bridge. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Brian Adam, Irene McGugan, Bruce Crawford, Shona Robison, Alex Johnstone, Fiona McLeod, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Tricia Marwick, Mr David Davidson, Ms Sandra White
S1M-1307 Replacement of Montrose Bridge (lodged on 1 November 2000) Andrew Wilson*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S1M-1307 Replacement of Montrose Bridge (lodged on 1 November 2000) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
